Package chaumette.othello.util.board.improved

Class ImprovedOthelloBoard

java.lang.Object
chaumette.othello.util.board.improved.ImprovedOthelloBoard
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImprovedOthelloOneDimArrayBoard
public abstract class ImprovedOthelloBoard extends Object
Represents an othello board as a data structure

      Initializes the board with the white and black pieces at the center

    • doMove

      public final void doMove (ImprovedMove m)
      Tries to do a given move. (Doesn't check if it's player's turn!!) Throws an InvalidMoveException if the move is invalid.
      Parameters:
      m - the Move to do

    • isValidMove

      public final boolean isValidMove (ImprovedMove m)
      Move is considered valid if the cell in question is empty, and placing the given color would cause at least one cell to flip.
      Parameters:
      m - the Move to check
      Returns:
      if the given move given the current player color would be valid

    • canDoValidMove

      public final boolean canDoValidMove (PlayerColor c)
      Parameters:
      c - the player color to check
      Returns:
      if the given player has any valid move

    • getValidMoves

      public final HashSet<ImprovedMove> getValidMoves (PlayerColor c)
      Parameters:
      c - the current player color
      Returns:
      all valid moves for the given player

    • isGameOver

      public final boolean isGameOver()
      Returns:
      if both players don't have any valid moves to do

    • getWinner

      public final PlayerColor getWinner()
      Returns:
      the winning player color, or EMPTY if it is a tie, or null, if the game is still running

    • flipColorOfCells

      protected final void flipColorOfCells (HashSet<ImprovedMove> sideEffects)
      Flips all cell colors at the given locations
      Parameters:
      sideEffects - a set of all cells which should be flipped

    • getProjection

      public final ImprovedMove[] getProjection (ImprovedMove from, ImprovedMove projectionVector)
      Parameters:
      from - starting point for the projections
      projectionVector - direction in which to project
      Returns:
      all board cells from the given point (inclusive) outwards in the given direction

    • getCellColor

      public final PlayerColor getCellColor (ImprovedMove m)
      Returns the color of a given cell
      Parameters:
      m - a Move object containing the coordinates of the cell
      Returns:
      the cell color of the given cell

    • setCell

      protected abstract void setCell (ImprovedMove m)
      Parameters:
      m - the cell to set to the given color

    • getCellColor

      public abstract PlayerColor getCellColor (int x, int y)
      Returns the color of a given cell
      Parameters:
      x - the x value of the cell (horizontal to the right counting from 0)
      y - the y value of the cell (vertical downwards counting from 0)
      Returns:
      the cell color of the given cell

    • getSideEffects

      protected HashSet<ImprovedMove> getSideEffects (ImprovedMove m)
      Computes and returns a Set of all the side effect (aka flipping stones) a given Move would have for the given PlayerColor. If the size of this Set is 0, the move is invalid.
      Parameters:
      m - the move to check for side effects
      Returns:
      a Set of all the side effect (aka flipping stones) a Move would have. If its size is 0, the move is invalid.

      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • simulate

      public abstract ImprovedOthelloBoard simulate (ImprovedMove move)
      Returns a copy of this board with the simulated move played, or null if move is invalid passing null returns the same board
